CutSceneText.Text: The castle gates are the first line of defense for the fortress.
They can withstand most attacks, and the Gate Guardian Stone can repair the gates,
so the fortress defenders can hold out a long time indeed.
But the Gate Guardian Stone only does its job
when you're using the Gate Restoration Stone.
If attackers deactivate the Restoration Stone,
they can destroy the castle gates in a flash.
Also, siege weapons can overwhelm even the strongest gate,
so destroy enemy siege weapons whenever you can.
